name: Proto Tower 34
description: This one was fun to draw, I think I'm getting (just barely) the hang of shading with such limited space and a limited color pallette - you really gotta think through what you are doing. I think this one looks a bit 'fuzzy' but sort of accomplished the effect I was going for.

attributes.value: for i in {31..35}; do cp template.json "$i.json"; done
